tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BirdMigrationLocations (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  bird_name VARCHAR(50),
  location_lat FLOAT,
  location_long FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE MigrationRoutes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bird_id INT NOT NULL,
  start_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  end_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  distance_km FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Birds (
   bird_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   bird_name TEXT,
   migration_date DATE,
   location_lat FLOAT,
   location_long FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE BirdTracks (
   track_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   bird_id INT,
   track_date DATE,
   location_lat FLOAT,
   location_long FLOAT,
   FOREIGN KEY (bird_id) REFERENCES Birds(bird_id)
);

CREATE TABLE bird_locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  latitude DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL,
  longitude DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL,
  species_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES bird_species(species_id)
);

CREATE TABLE migration_routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  start_location_id INT NOT NULL,
  end_location_id INT NOT NULL,
  migration_distance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT start_location_fk FOREIGN KEY (start_location_id) REFERENCES bird_locations(location_id),
  CONSTRAINT end_location_fk FOREIGN KEY (end_location_id) REFERENCES bird_locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE bird_tracking (
  tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bird_id INT NOT NULL,
  device_id INT NOT NULL,
  location_id INT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT bird_fk FOREIGN KEY (bird_id) REFERENCES bird_species(species_id),
  CONSTRAINT device_fk FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES tracking_devices(device_id),
  CONSTRAINT location_fk FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES bird_locations(location_id)
);
